title: An [Attempt at] Refutation of General Relativity and Quantum Theories
description:
reference: viXra:2210.0161v1
title: An [Attempt at] Refutation of General Relativity and Quantum Theories
authors: Manfred U. E. Pohl
category: Mathematical Physics
type: submission
date: 2022-10-31 01:10:43
abstract: It is briefly shown that all physical theories that fall back on a mathematical application of the circle number π as an irrational dimensionless number are irrational and incorrect in their explanatory content, since they divide the physical dimensions of space (L) and time (T) into an incorrect and make an irrational connection.
